unsolicited.advice: If your job is stressful, just quit…
Don’t pop your pimples like a little bitch—cut into them with a straight razor.
Max out your credit cards. File bankruptcy. Rinse and repeat baby

Stay with your partner. You’re nearly 30. Sure, they’re mean, but all the good ones are already taken. You waited too long. I am obviously very healthy and in a very happy marriage and this worldview isn’t detrimental whatsoever.
The best way to avoid a hangover is to never stop drinking [*cries in AA*]
If you’re depressed, then just don’t? Like just stop being depressed. Easy. Boombadabing baybeeeee *jazz hands*
Do something that scares you at least once a day, like base jumping, or hijacking a helicopter, or stealing an animal from the zoo, or calling your mom. It’s good for mental fortitude.
Revamping your lifestyle in a healthy way is too big an undertaking—just have a can of tuna and an apple once a day at breakfast instead. Easy and effective weight-loss. Everyone loves morning tuna.
If you close your eyes no one can see you.
Don’t go to the ER unless you’re absolutely positive that you’re dying
